long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides simple and effective way of not using Facebook too much. This extension does not collect any information about your Facebook account, it just displays a big message on white screen which effectively stops you from using Facebook.
